name: Spy Fox In: Hold the Mustard
description: Climb aboard to help SPY Fox save the world's ketchup supply from the evil King Konglomerate! Maneuver SPY Fox's M.E.S.S through water, space and air!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Procesor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: This is the best game i've ever played. I would play this game all day if I could, but i love wow but... this takes 1st place for me. 101/1 would make a meme of this again. I love memes as well.
